snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia. The Board of Directors, residents and staff of The Hebrew Home at Riverdale deeply mourn the loss of Sylvia Olnick, beloved wife of our late Trustee Robert Olnick, loving mother of our dear friend Barbara Lane and mother-in-law of our esteemed Trustee Richard S. Lane. Sylvia was a warm, gracious and generous woman who will be missed by all. With deep affection and in profound sadness we extend our heartfelt condolences on the passing of a devoted mother and grandmother. May the entire Olnick and Lane families be comforted among the mourners of Zion. The Hebrew Home at Riverdale Jeffrey S. Maurer, Chairman Daniel Reingold, President & CEO 1/3
